content.detailedDescription: I went to bed approx 12:40.  my window faces west.  i had the blinds closed but a flickering light caught my attention.  i went to the window & saw what i thought to be a satellite that looked like a star.  i watched it for a while to discern what it was & if it was moving.  the object was bright & was far above the tree line.  i saw light beam down from the object just below it & a ring of circles of light & then it was back to just the object again.  it did this several times.  i also saw light radiate from it & lighting up the sky in one direction from the object as if it put on its headlights.  approx 15 minutes went by & the object was just at tree line & then disappeared behind the trees.  it moved irradically with quick movements & then just hover.  it moved from side to side & up & down.  it seemed to move so that it would not be noticeable unless you were watching it.  i went & got my binnoculars.  i noticed another bright star in the west but higher up.  i looked through my binnoculars & saw a yellow sphere & it was spinning in one direction from down to up.  as it turned i saw it was covered in brighter yellow circles of light.  it was like a burning radiating tiny planet only it was not a natural made object.  i could only see this detail with the binnoculars.  this moved in the same way but remained in the same general area for the duration of time i watched it.  for about a half hour then i went to bed.  i've been seeing these objects that i describe as mimicking stars for 20 plus years but i have never seen a spinning yellow light sphere or the detail i saw through binnoculars.  it must have been closer then the ones i viewed in the past.  i would imagine it is very large up close.  i feel disturbed by seeing this up in the night sky as people sleep & wonder what it is & what it is doing.  it alarms me that this is taken place covertly.  it is obvious to me that our government & the technology we have would detect this & that alarms me that our own world governments remain covert as well.  but i was able to just go right to sleep after all this.  i thought i wish it wasn't right above my home.  i woke up this morning & it was heavy on my mind so i did an internet search & for the first time i am reporting it.  it was just incredibly bizarre to see what i saw through binnoculars.  sorry i don't have a camcorder.
content.summary: Spinning sphere of yellow light hovering & moving

content.detailedDescription: People all over our indian reservation are seeing black creatures that seem to disappear after they show themselves, a dog like creature, a bird , a big foot and others , more and more stories. and human faces in the storm clouds,
content.summary: Black creatures

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of friday, may 28, i was scheduled to play in a friend's band in chattanooga, tn. the show was scheduled for about 10 pm, so we decided to get together for a practice beforehand. we met, practiced, and as we were leaving i looked at my watch, which said 10:08 (we were late). there were a total of 5 of us, but we traveled in two cars to carry the equipment. three in one car, two in another. i was in the car of three, and as were were driving south down north market st. in chattanooga, i looked out the left passenger window to see if it might look like rain and noticed something unusual. 

there were three lights in a perfectly triangular arrangement. the rear two were bright white with hints of yellow, and the front light was red. it seemed to be at about the altitude of a normal plane, but seemed to be altering its course somewhat, making unusual turns. as it passed over our car, i called attention to it and told my friends to look at out the other window (right side) it as it passed over. we all then looked out the other side, and saw another strange object, this one diamond shaped. it consisted of 4 very bright lights in a diamond formation and was flying quite low--about the level of a search helicopter. 

my friend immediately pulled over, and we all got out of the car to watch these two objects. upon first reaction, i thought the object resembled some sort of lantern on fire or an unusual type of fireworks display, but it became clear in seconds that is was neither. the diamond kept gliding and the triangle passed over it, though much higher in th sky. both objects were completely silent, which was the most chilling aspect, as the diamond was so low to the ground, perhaps just over the treetops. it is difficult to say how large it was, or how to compare it, but i'd say it may have been about like a car turned vertically, floating in the air. as they kept moving, their orientation must have changed or certain lights must have gone out, because the diamond at one point suddenly became two very bright lights side-by-side and began rising in altitude. though it was dark, i knew the general direction it was heading and it appeared to be going toward signal mountain, about 10-15 miles away. 

the triangle continued to travel as well, and as it continued, the two whitish back lights disappeared and only the front red light remained visible as it traveled away from us. i suppose it is possible that it could have been a red tail light of some sort? both objects eventually disappeared, the diamond rising constantly in elevation until they were out of sight. the three of us stood there in disbelief, and for the remainder of the evening, none of us could shake the images. we told numerous people once we reached the club and their reactions have prompted me to make this report (the first i have ever made). this was certainly the most unusual thing i have ever seen and never seen anything that even resembled either object.
content.summary: Diamond and triangle ufos seen crossing paths

content.detailedDescription:
The first object spotted was the smaller craft. i would say it was about the size of 3-4 ford explorers.  it had four distinct lights: 3 red in a row along a leading edge and 1 green.  i first observed this object moving in different directions in the night sky.  changing directions and altitudes.  then a larger object appeared that was lit underneath with white lights but i could not determine the size of this object other than to say it was large.  these two objects at time flew separately and at times in formation.  at one time both disappeared from sight going east.  after about 15 minutes the larger object appeared in the west going east.  as i followed it going toward the lake i witnessed the smaller object detaching from the larger object and going to the northwest.  
the next night, saturday, these two objects appeared again.  the smaller of the two was the most visible over time.  at one time in the observation the smaller object appeared to be hovering over schaumberg (a guess) and from where i was it was a small dot and appeared to be oscillating from red to green.  near the end of the viewing on saturday i got my best look at the smaller vehicle as it passed from the west to the east in front of me.  the smaller one was behind the bigger object seeming to be flying in formation.  as they headed east the smaller one got closer and closer to the larger object and at one point either docked or was taken aboard or something of that nature as there no longer was two objects but just the larger one.  it continued east until it was out of site. 
it appeared to me that what i saw was a base ship that launched a smaller vehicle to move about a region and then dock to move unto some other location.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Base ship with smaller craft flying around dupage and cook county

content.detailedDescription: I have two photo's.
content.summary: Cigar shape pinched in middle, all white. traveling n.E.

content.detailedDescription: The object was travelling roughly sweet and flashed east.  definitely in upper atmosphere if not low earth orbit.  i am 43 years of age.
content.summary: Early morning on june 1, i was stargazing with a set of pvs-14 night vision.  i first noticed what appeared to be a sat.  my focus was shifted to a flash at near 90 degrees.  i was startled because the flash left a trail directly back ro the "satellite "

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside checking my towels on the line at around 11pm on may 31 '10 to see if they were dry. i usually look at the stars to see if i can spot a planet when a deep red star caught my eye. it was the only thing visible in the sky and i thought to myself "that is way too red to be a planet". i'd never seen anything so red in the sky, it almost made me afraid. all of a sudden, it started moving slowly, taking the path the airplanes do around my house. i watch them when i'm out at night, but this one was different. it's blinking seemed to try and mimic the airplanes, but it was round and moved differently. i always see planes blinking from the bottom, but all of it was flashing. it's like it was trying really hard to move slowly and blink at the right times, it's hard to explain. i followed it until it was out of my sight. i know it wasn't an airplane because it stood still in the air for ten to fifteen seconds not "signaling", just a deep red. it was hypnotizing. i lost sight of it because my neighbor's trees got in the way. i now am on mufon writing down my "sighting". it was just about two minutes, i didn't have a camera on me, and i was confused. society makes you feel wrong for seeing one so maybe i'm trying to convince myself i didn't see what i saw. i've had a legitimate sighting before when i was around 12 in the early 2000's so i'm not as choked up as one would be. it's a little upsetting that it happened again, i just feel uncomfortable and nervous and wish i hadn't seen anything. anyway, thank you for your time.

ps,
my brother was riding home from a friend's house and told me after i told him what i saw tonight that he noticed a bright light in the sky that didn't seem to belong there. don't know if this helps, it could have been the same thing i saw, we're both good at spotting planets and airplanes and he said it didn't look like either. just thought i'd add that in.
content.summary: Oddly deep red star stands still, starts moving, mimicking airplane but not quite.

content.detailedDescription: My name is [cms/tg/pid] and i live in toledo ohio. some years back i was shown a place called the secret beach where the fishing was supposed to be the best and the waters warm and clean. since then i have been going to this place often to retreat with my family or to have alone time with my self away from the city. since i have been going to this place i have seen things that i have kept to myself due to the "enviroment" that i live in. talking about aliens and ufos may cause me great harm. anyway, on the day i would like to report, i went to the beach with about 6 friends and some of our kids. while on the beach you can see several islands in the distance, and one of my friends noticed something like a blimp hanging in the air above one of them. as we all stared at what we thought was a bright white blimp when one of my friends yelled -[cms/tg/pd] this bro that [cms/tg/pd] is rotating! we all watched this thing hang above the island for about 20 mins then we all heard the rumble of jets and the thing was gone. we never saw any jets. we did watch a large group of birds fly off the island while this thing was floating above because i remember making a joke about it. located directly on the beach is some sort of plant that uses the water and sends it back out at a high temp. there is also the nuclear plant in eyes distance, im not sure if thats what is attracting them or what. there is something there. me and my girlfriend also seen them going into the water right in front of us.
content.summary: [cms/tg/pid]

content.detailedDescription:
We received a call from a friend to look outside at some odd objects in the sky. we (my friend and i) went outside to look, but we couldn't see anything, so we drove out to where our friend was. on the way we noticed the object he was talking about. it was amber colored and somewhat star-like with two lights on the side and eight small lights flashing around them in a circular formation. upon arriving at our friend's location, we noticed a large star-like object that was not the one we had seen before. it had lights at the bottom and two beaming lights on the side. it quickly vanished. afterward, we noticed several more, approximately 6, star-like objects with flashing lights. two of which we could barely make out the actual ship body, which was triangular. as we were leaving and they had vanished, we noticed a massive white-blue light appear in the sky, seemingly out of nowhere, and it began advancing toward us at high speeds. as it was directly over us, it was silent and then turned on some sound-cloaking device that was pseudo-plane-like. it had two blue lights at the side of it and its central light, which was white, cast an aura over the object. it hastily made its way across the sky toward the original object's destination.
the body of the object was sort of crescent-like, but at the same time boomerang-ish.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw several ufos jet across the sky at high speeds

content.detailedDescription: I was in the passengers seat driving with my stepfather picking up some food. it was around 7:30 pm may 22, 2010 saturday. it was still bright outside. i always look up at the sky when we go for a drive, that's when i saw the ufo. at first i thought it was a square, but it seems it was more triangular/rectangular. i  only saw it for 10-20 seconds. the shape was a black triangular/rectangular it stood still and it was small. i tried to keep looking at it when houses and trees got in my view, then it disappeared. i kept on searching for it but it was definitely gone. i was shocked and surprised to see it and when it was gone. my stepfather couldn't see anything since it wasn't in his view.
content.summary: A black triangular/rectagular ufo

content.detailedDescription: It was 8:40pm i drove in to my driveway and got out of my car, i walk to my mailbox and started going through my mails, after i was done i look up to the clear night sky looking at the stars and there was no a moon that night it was a clear warm night, as i am looking up to the sky i saw a small green sphere to my right view thinking it was a star but i see it was moving at slow speed heading north, it was getting bigger as it was closer to my center view, no noise no stroking lights, them suddenly it made an l turn to the east, it made the very sharp turn with out stopping nor slowing down and gaining speed and then it just vanish, i do not know if it vanish or gain so much speed in that short distant heading tour the sky the i lost sight of it, after seeing that i got nerves and could not comprehend, it was a perfect sphere,( sorry i did not have a video phone to get photos ) i was in in a slow and al this happen in less then a minute.
content.summary: Perfect bright green sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
a group of friends and myself were sitting outside during a late night memorial day bbq when we noticed an object in the sky.  earlier that evening, several thunderstorm fronts had passed over the neighborhood.  the sky was sparsely populated with clouds at the time of the sighting and the moon appeared in the south.  
     we were sitting in the backyard and i noticed something catch my eye.   i got the attention of my friends who were sitting next to me as i pointed at the sky and asked what the object was.    
      the object appeared to be 40-50 feet above the ground and just above the trees in the backyard.  it was moving north and appeared to be curving towards the ground.  the speed was not blindingly fast, but was quick enough to move out of our view of sight within 4 seconds.  the object appeared to made of light, like a comet, but didn't emit light like a lantern or lamp.  there was no sound.  the tail end of the object resembled the trail of a comet; the color at the end was orange.  one of the witnesses said the orange tail of the object was shaped like a triangle.
       after the object had passed from our view, only four of us outside had actually seen the object.
this report is pieced together from our brief discussion concerning what we had witnessed.  the object resembled what i imagine a low flying shooting star would look like.
content.summary: Comet-like object seen over residential area near may ave and nw 50 in the early morning

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at the pool at tuscany suites on flamingo rd las vegas,nv i was just watching the sky,there is alot of activity in the skies above las vegas like constant helicopters and flights coming and going from mccarren airport.It was 1:05pm when i was looking north i noticed a white sphere floating high in the sky at first it wasnt moving then started to drift slowly and changing direction which leads me to believe it wasnt being blown by the wind. i was watching it for several minutes and then another came into view. both were traveling from west to east and made zig-zag pattern thru the sky. then they faded away until i couldnt see them anymore. they were in the flight pattern of planes departing the airport they appeared right after a plane flew through the airspace and disapeared before the next plane entered the airspace. planes were flying in that pattern every ten minutes or so. they looked alot like floating white orbs.
content.summary: 2 white sphere's floating/drifting/flying in flight pattern of mccarren airport las vegas

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with the neighbors and a fireball was visible in the sky. it looked like the flame of a hot air balloon but it was moving too fast for one. we all observed as it went across the sky. we took out our phones at the time and took a picture of it. we were all shocked and had no idea what it could have possibly been. we lost sight of it as it left view in the sky.
content.summary: Looked like a hot air balloon with flame.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the sunset i was at the top of a hill, i was gazing a lake.  when i turned back, i spotted at low altitude a huge orange sphere of very bright light.  i didn't know what it was, i moved sideways and the ball followed me.  i felt pure energies of peace and joyce.  the sphere seems to play with me by moving with me sideways.
after about 20 minutes playing with the sphere in the field (the sphere was following me). i decided to leave the location.  suddenly at lighting speed the sphere went with others stars in the sky and shine very bright and friendly orange color.

the next days i looked on youtube, and someone in usa, pa filmed with a night vision camera a ufo that looks like what i saw. (thanks!!)

ufo shoots laser! october 10, 2009 murrysville, pa 

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=gktwmzljxy0&translated=1
content.summary: Orange ball of light

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were having a garage sale,but nobody was showing up.So we just started taking pictures.My frind looked across my pond,took a picture,looked at the picture.Then up at the sky.She saw the ufo,then pointed to show me,but it was gone.We didnt know what it was when we first sawe it.We couldnt hear it and havnt seen it since.We were at my house,dola ohio.During the sightning she looked suprised.After it.I was shocked,and we just kinda sat there,looking around the sky to see if we saw it.We lost sight of it because my friend looked at me to show me where it was at,looked up&it was gone.
content.summary: Friend looks,points to show me,its gone.

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture from an airplane, going from panama city, central america, to orlando florida, us.  on the 31st of octuber 2009, did not notice it was there until later when i was paying attention to the pictures i took.
content.summary: Looks like an object entering the earth orbit.

content.detailedDescription: On august 25, 2007, i was attending a birthday party for my 3 year old grandson at the stephenville city park in stephenville, texas.  i would occasionally look up at the sky because there was an approaching thunderstorm headed our way from the north west.  as i was scanning the sky, i noticed, off to the east, what appeared to be a floating object, possibly an advertisment banner, but there was no airplane pulling the banner.  it was headed in our direction and the closer it got, i was able to get a better view.  at this time, i asked my son to record the object on his camcorder.  he zoomed in on the object and we were able to record at least 45-47 seconds, and then my son quit recording because his battery was low and he wanted to save the battery to record the birthday party.  i pointed the object out to others around me and no one knew what it was, nor had anyone ever seen anything like it before.  the object was in the shape of a long blimp, but it was not a blimp-it was moving as if it was floating ever so slowly towards the west.  as it floated, it changed shapes with jerking movements, it swayed back and forth, sideways, and up and down.  it was clearly mechanical movements that our government could only wish they had.  the object and its movements were totally out of this world. this continued with jerking movements which seemed to follow the swaying, s-shape, back and forth, sideways, then up and down again until it was out of sight.  once the object was out of sight, i took my grandson over to the playground.  all of a sudden, out of nowhere, there was a man sitting on a bench next to the playground.  the man appeared to be staring through me.  i strongly felt like he was either reading me or implanting me, or both, so much so that the hair on my neck stood straight up.  i turned for a split second to grab my grandson and turned back to look at the man, but he was gone.  i could see for at least 100 yards around me and the man was nowhere to be found.  by the time i walked back to the picnic table, i had severe flu-like symptoms.  i told my wife we needed to get home.  we drove 30 minutes to comanche.  as soon as i got home, i laid down on my bed.  i was very dizzy, i had stomach cramps, diarhea, chills, and sweating.  i fell asleep for only 5 minutes, but it seemed like 8 hours.  i then woke up feeling great as if nothing was wrong with me.  i have, since then, had many dreams of ufos, aliens attacking earth.  i have also had many ufo sightings since then.  i have attempted to attach the video which contains the 45 seconds of the object-please view.
content.summary: S-shaped silver blimp-like object in sky floating/moving over the stephenville park moving with jerking movements as if mechanically operated.

content.detailedDescription: Ok,we were at the local taco bell when we seen the object, we thought it was just a helicopter. so we wen't on, i looked out the back window of the car and it was following us, we lost it behind a grove of trees. it became visible again on our right, we pulled in the drive got out to listen for it. but we herd nothing, it hovered above our neighbors house then began heading west when it just, dissapeared. the object was just like a very bright white beam and the object was circular. i was stunned i myself am a u.F.O hunter.
content.summary: Was one bright white light and it followed us home. i got out to listen but heard nothing it dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking around my property after noon on the 17th of may this year 2010 and looked up between my trees... from the east of my field of vision appeared a round bright-white colored object moving due west toward ft leavenworth ks. i am in a flight pattern near kci airport and expected to hear sound (as all the craft i see here do) but there was none. at that altitude it appeared to be at least a mile high (if it were a plane the same size) it moved at a constant speed across the sky until it disappeared from my field of vision. it took about 15 seconds to clear my sight and was perfectly round from my vantage point. oddly enough it was in the same flight pattern as commonly seen com-trails that are constantly in the same area here west of kansas city.
content.summary: Object at higher altitude moves slowly

content.detailedDescription: Every night since we saw the amber colored light in the sky we go outside before bed time and look at the stars and smoke to see if we see something else and like clock work about every three days or so and sometimes night to night we see a strange wight or some times yellow colored sphere shaped object darts across the sky this time they are not as close to the ground as our first sighting. most of the time we will see the light as it flies toward the house like it is descending and then all of a sudden it will drift back upwards and out of the atmosphere. it even sometimes just darts upwards and dissapears. the one we saw two nights ago we were tracking a satalite and then my wife spotted a bright white light that she thought was a star moving around the ursa minor stars near kocab. it then vanished and about 1 minute later we spotted it again and then it bursted a bright white light as if it was a meteor burning up in the atmosphere for like 2 seconds and then faded into a dim ball and instead of descending like a meteor it started to drift upward until the light got so small it dissappeard into the ursa major stars near dubhe. we were realy excited as we have been seeing strange lights for a while but not with the capabilities of this one. we are going to continue to look when the weather clears up and try to video tape it.
content.summary: Out side smoking again with my wife and from january til march 29 2010 we have seen strange lights and flight paths.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i tend to step out side and smoke and look at the stars.Since i have a background in astrology and astrophysics i always point out the constilations and planets and satellites to her. on this paticular night it was very cold and the skies were clear and is i was showing here venus and polaris she asked me "what that star was" as i lookes i was astonished to not know it seemed stationary at first but we noticed it was getting brighter. it had a spherical shape and was an amber color and was a constant brightness.I thought it may have been a helicopter at first since we live next to fort stewart georgia and hunter army air field is not that far away. i myself am in the military and now how to identify each at night time. besides there were air planes that flew behind it as if it wasnt even there and thats how we new it was a point of origin fro space but actually flying towards us. it mad now sounds and then occasionally flew up and down fast. i tried to video tape the object it wouldnt show up on the screen the closer i zoomed in the more distorted it got. from what we could tell with the airplanes and helicopters flying by it it looked about triple the size of any conventinal air craft.We went back inside to see if it was just us or an annomaly. we came back outside at 2200 and 2300 and it was still outside but closer and doing the same irratic movements. we never lost sight of the object but after 3 hours of watching we decided to go to bed since it didnt appear to be threatening. i got up to use the restroom around 0315 the next morning and looked outside and the object was gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We were sitting outside smoking and we saw a large amber colered sphere of light was slowly traveling over our neighbor hood.

content.detailedDescription: I just came was looking at the pics i had taken while riding down the oregon coast and came across this one..... i have tried to rule out a lot of explenations but i cant figuer out what it might be... i also have other pics that i took at the some location and the are no objects in veiw. if anyone has an exsplenation of this object in my pic please let me know....
content.summary: Unknown object in picture on oregon coast.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were in our backyard sitting by a fire at around 10pm.  we looked over our back fence and she noticed these two objects, each were slowly changing colors from red to blue to greenish.  the objects cycled through their colors over the span of about 2 or 3 seconds.  we got the video camera out (i dont know how to attach the file) and video taped them for about 5 minutes.  

the objects appeared to be over camp williams (reserve base).  what was so strange was the way that they were manuevering.  they would accelerate rapidly and then change direction very quickly.  after video taping for 5 minutes, the objects disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red and blue crafts manuevering and accelerating wildly.
